reviews.review_msg: He is a VERY hard marker.. I made the mistake of taking is 223 in my first year and boy was I in for a shock.  You are never right with the guy, he seems like he always has some way to disagree with you.  Although he is educated, he is hot-head about it and knows that he knows more than you.  Expect hard work and your GPA to take a hit!  BEWARE
